scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-mjs && npm run compile
scripts.clean: rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rm -f src/**/*.js && rm -f src/**/*.d.ts && rm -f src/**/*.map
scripts.copy-mjs:
cd dist && echo "require = require('esm')(module/*, options*/)
module.exports = require('./main.js')
export * from './index.js'" > index.cjs
